mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction VALUES ( seq_transaction_tran_no.NEXTVAL, #{purchaseProd.prodNo} , #{buyer.userId }, #{paymentOption }, #{receiverName} , #{receiverPhone}, #{dlvyAddr}, #{dlvyRequest }, #{tranCode }, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{dlvyDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_name, t.prod_no, t.buyer_id, t.payment_option, t.RECEIVER_NAME, t.receiver_phone, t.DEMAILADDR, t.dlvy_request, t.dlvy_date, t.ORDER_DATA, t.tran_status_code, t.tran_no FROM transaction t , product p WHERE t.prod_no= p.prod_no(+) AND t.tran_no = #{tranNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE transaction SET tran_status_code = #{tranCode} WHERE tran_no = #{tranNo}
